typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_AcceptedAnswerId} as long,
		{_AnswerCount} as long,
		{_Body} as string,
		{_ClosedDate} as string,
		{_CommentCount} as long,
		{_CommunityOwnedDate} as string,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_FavoriteCount} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastActivityDate} as string,
		{_LastEditDate} as string,
		{_LastEditorDisplayName} as string,
		{_LastEditorUserId} as long,
		{_OwnerDisplayName} as string,
		{_OwnerUserId} as long,
		{_ParentId} as long,
		{_PostTypeId} as long,
		{_Score} as long,
		{_Tags} as string,
		{_Title} as string,
		{_ViewCount} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SrcPost
source(output(
		{_Count} as long,
		{_ExcerptPostId} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_TagName} as string,
		{_WikiPostId} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcTags
SrcPost, SrcTags join(SrcPost@{_Id} == {_ExcerptPostId},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinPostTags
JoinPostTags select(mapColumn(
		{_AcceptedAnswerId},
		{_AnswerCount},
		{_Body},
		{_ClosedDate},
		{_CommentCount},
		{_CommunityOwnedDate},
		{_CreationDate},
		{_FavoriteCount},
		{_LastActivityDate},
		{_LastEditDate},
		{_LastEditorDisplayName},
		{_LastEditorUserId},
		{_OwnerDisplayName},
		{_OwnerUserId},
		{_ParentId},
		{_PostTypeId},
		{_Score},
		{_Tags},
		{_Title},
		{_ViewCount},
		{_Count},
		{_ExcerptPostId},
		{_TagName},
		{_WikiPostId}
	)) ~> Select
Select aggregate(groupBy({_TagName}),
	Count = countDistinct({_Id}),
		LastActivityDate = max({_LastActivityDate})) ~> AggrTags
AggrTags sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		{_TagName},
		{_Count} = Count,
		LastActivityDate
	)) ~> DestPostsByTags
